A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I went to a premier of this hot garbage\, and most of the audience was silent for the best part of the movie. Apart from a few chuckles\, there was no emotion outburst from the audience. Not something I would expect from people who like Star Wars. And after the film ended\, there was no cheering\, no nothing. I could feel the disappointment in the air\, as the viewers were leaving the cinema. And exactly that sums up this movie. It is just some random guys' (the director R.J. and the screenwriters) attempt to create something different with SW universe\, but failing miserably. It was so boring\, the characters we loved (from the original trilogy) were torn down to fillers\, and the new characters (from TFA) went nowhere. To be honest\, every story in this film felt unimportant\, as did most of the characters. To express my feelings about this movie in Master Yoda's words: \"An utter disappointment this movie is.\"
